_header: Among these friars within an cloister
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 144; followed without a break by 3488.
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; crucifixion; dream visions
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of the passioun of Christ’ — twelve 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘O mankynd for the lufe of the’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Amang thir freiris within ane cloisterI enterit in ane
                    oritorie…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…And tholit to be crucifyidO mankynd for the luif of
                    the
CamMagPep2553.Note: No indication of end before 3488 begins.

BLAru285.First Lines: Amang thir freris within a ClosterI Enterit in ane oratory…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …And tholit tovt crucifyidO mankind for þe lufe of þe
BLAru285.Note: On folios 168-169 plus the misbound folio 171-171v.

Asloan.First Lines:
amang þir freris in a closterI ruterit in ane oratoryAnd
                    knelit dovne…
Asloan.Last Lines:
…And tholit to be crucefyidO mankyng for þe luf of
                    þe
